biotools.summary: Database of peroxiredoxin (Prx or PRDX) protein sequences unambiguously classified into one of six distinct subfamilies. Subfamily members were identified using the Deacon Active Site Profiler (DASP) bioinformatics tool to focus in on functionally relevant sequence fragments surrounding key residues required for protein activity. Searches of this database can be conducted by protein annotation, accession number, PDB ID, organism name or protein sequence.
